text: Red Dead Redemption 2 is a Western-themed video game developed and published by Rockstar Games. It is part of the Red Dead series and a prequel to Red Dead Redemption. It was released on October 26, 2018. == Gameplay == Red Dead Redemption 2 is set in an open world environment, featuring the United States in 1899. Players can play in first- or third-person perspective. Red Dead Redemption 2 has different landscapes, such as plains and mountains. Players can use horses to travel, either by taming wild horses or stealing them. == Notes== == References == Category:2018 video games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Hunting video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Rockstar Games games Category:Video game prequels Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Western (genre) video games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Red Dead Redemption 2
